revised_title: Investigating Phagocytosis and the Incitor Element in Heated Serum
tldr: The authors investigate the presence of an incitor element in the heated serum of patients who have responded to tubercular infection or tubercle vaccine, and its role in promoting phagocytosis. They discuss the sources of fallacy that must be eliminated to better understand the nature of this incitor element and its opsonic action on bacteria.
